name: Bay Bell
description:
Bay Bell is a science fiction point and click word puzzle game. Navigate the off-course “Bay Bell” spaceship, decipher languages, learn the unique backstories of those on board, and find a way toward returning home.

The end is near… Can you save the Bay Bell?

Features:

  • Space, time travel, humans, robots, and aliens! Meet a cast of interesting and likeable characters with their own dreams, fears, hopes, and goals aboard the spaceship.
  • 65 challenging but accessible letter cipher puzzles. Even for players unaccustomed to deciphering, these are designed to be approachable for all ages.
  • A story-rich experience that unfolds from solving the game's puzzles.
  • Artwork in an abstract painterly style. Enjoy distinctive visuals while you play!
